items.value: Business makes Sergio hungry, he need something to eat!

There you are again :)
I tell you I'm so hungry but I have to work!

Can you maybe bring me the following:
1x Vegetable Soup
1x Fried Egg
1x Bread

i can't work when i'm hungry...
I will also give you a good reward my friend!
that is much! where should I find that?
Yes, i have the required food with me!
Sounds good but i come back later!

Hmm good question, maybe at the food store?
Or at the veggie store, cooking yourself is also possible!

Bob only told me good things about you.
You can do it, I'm sure!
ok please show me the list again

ah how delicious it smells!
did you do it all yourself?

Anyway, here's your reward, may get some good fish:
1x raw Fishing Pole
1x Fishing Wire
1x Fishing Float

Now you can build your fishing Pole!
great, I will visit you soon!

you dont have the food i want!
please come back as soon you got it...
